easy.question: What is 15 + 28?
Subtract 47 from 90.
Multiply 12 by 3.
Divide 64 by 8.
What is the next number in the series: 5, 10, 15, 20, ?
If a packet costs ₹50, what is the cost of 4 packets?
The area of a square is 49 sq.m. What is the length of its side?
How many sides does a hexagon have?
A dozen bananas cost ₹60. How much for 1 banana?
1 liter is equal to how many milliliters?
If 9 pens cost ₹90, what is the cost of 3 pens?
What is 7 squared?
If a car covers 60 km in 1 hour, how much distance will it cover in 4 hours?
Subtract 33 from 78.
If the perimeter of a rectangle is 24m and its length is 7m, what is its breadth?
Simplify: 9 + 3 × 4
If 1 week has 7 days, how many days are there in 4 weeks?
A bus departs at 5 PM and reaches at 9 PM. How many hours did it travel?
Find the missing number: 2, 4, 8, 16, ?
If 100 apples are equally divided among 5 people, how many apples does each person get?

medium.question: A man invests ₹6000 at 12% p.a. simple interest for 3 years. Find the interest.
A shopkeeper marks an article at ₹500 and offers a 10% discount. Selling price?
If the ratio of boys to girls is 4:5 and total students are 81, find the number of girls.
A train running at 72 km/h crosses a pole in 25 seconds. Find its length.
A and B together can finish a work in 8 days. A alone can do it in 12 days. How long will B take alone?
The average of 15, 20, 25, 30, 35 is?
A man bought a fan for ₹1200 and sold it for ₹1500. Find his profit percentage.
A sum of ₹10000 is compounded annually at 8% for 2 years. Find the amount.
If 6 workers can complete a job in 15 days, how many days will 10 workers take?
If the perimeter of a circle is 44 cm, find its radius.
The difference between simple and compound interest on ₹5000 for 2 years at 10% is?
If the speed of a car is 60 km/h, how much time does it take to cover 180 km?
The population of a village increases by 5% annually. If the present population is 2205, what was it 1 year ago?
What is the square root of 225?
A man covers a distance in 3 hours at a speed of 60 km/h. Find the distance.
If 3 numbers have an average of 50 and two numbers are 45 and 55, what is the third number?
A bag contains 5 red and 3 blue balls. A ball is drawn randomly. Probability of getting a red ball?
If a person spends 60% of his salary and saves ₹4000, what is his total salary?
A boat takes 4 hours to go downstream and 5 hours upstream. Speed of boat in still water is 12 km/h. Find the speed of the stream.

hard.question: A sum amounts to ₹13310 in 2 years at compound interest at 10% p.a. Find the principal.
A tank can be filled by one pipe in 12 hours and emptied by another in 20 hours. If both are open, how long will it take to fill the tank?
A train 360 m long is running at 45 km/h. How long will it take to cross a platform 140 m long?
If A can do a piece of work in 10 days and B can do it in 15 days, working together, how long will they take?
A man can row 30 km downstream in 3 hours and upstream in 5 hours. Find the speed of the boat in still water.
If the compound interest on ₹5000 for 3 years is ₹1576.25, find the rate of interest.
The average age of a family of 5 members is 26 years. If the youngest member is 4 years old, what was the average age before the youngest was born?
Two numbers are such that their HCF is 16 and their LCM is 256. If one number is 64, find the other.
A batsman has an average of 45 runs in 20 innings. If he scores 95 runs in the next innings, what will be his new average?
A shopkeeper gains 20% after allowing a discount of 10%. Find the marked price if the cost price is ₹450.
Two pipes can fill a cistern in 15 and 20 minutes respectively, but a waste pipe empties it in 30 minutes. Time to fill the cistern when all are open?
A sum of money triples in 8 years at simple interest. Find the rate of interest per annum.
The present age of a father is three times that of his son. Five years ago, the father's age was four times his son's age. Find their present ages.
A train overtakes two persons walking in the same direction at speeds of 3 km/h and 5 km/h in 36 seconds and 30 seconds respectively. Find the speed of the train.
A and B can do a job in 4 days. B alone can do it in 12 days. How long would A take to do the job alone?
The compound interest on ₹6400 at 5% p.a. for 2 years is?
A car covers a distance at 60 km/h in 5 hours. What will be the time taken at 75 km/h?
A man buys an article for ₹2500 and sells it at a loss of 5%. Find the selling price.
The perimeter of a semicircle is 72 cm. Find the radius.
A, B, and C can complete a piece of work in 10, 15, and 20 days respectively. How long will they take to complete it together?
